features: EXTREME-HOLD: features Extreme Hold adhesive technology, which means that the bandages stay on firmly until you take them off
DURABLE, HEAVY-DUTY FABRIC: ideal for outstanding heavy-duty protection, designed for sports and active lifestyles
ANTIBACTERIAL NON-STICK PAD: the pad contains the active ingredient, 0.8% Benzalkonium Chloride, which helps prevent infection. It is also non-stick so that it does not disrupt your wound
TOUGH & FLEXIBLE: Rugged woven fabric conforms to body and flexes with movement
3X MORE ABSORBENT: the Performance Series bandages are 3X more absorbent than other leading brands
body.description: Product Description CURAD Performance Series is the lineup of rugged supports, wraps, kinesiology tape and bandages made to withstand the demands of active people. Every solution is designed to last through the toughest workouts and competition. Made to stay on through rain, mud and movement, CURAD Performance Series bandages feature antibacterial pads, flexible fabric and tenacious adhesive to give you comfort with dirt and germ protection when the going gets tough. Not for use on delicate and sensitive skin. Manufacturer Contact Information 800-633-5463

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: CURAD PERFORMANCE SERIES ASSORTED BANDAGES CURAD Performance Series is the lineup of rugged supports, wraps, kinesiology tape and bandages made to withstand the demands of active people. Every solution is designed to last through the toughest workouts and competition. Made to stay on through rain, mud and movement, CURAD Performance Series bandages feature antibacterial pads, flexible fabric and tenacious adhesive to give you comfort with dirt and germ protection when the going gets tough. Not for use on delicate and sensitive skin.

ADDITIONAL FEATURES Extreme Hold Adhesive Technology For protection that lasts through the toughest work and play. Antibacterial Pad With 3x Absorbency Highly absorbent pad is treated with Benzalkonium Chloride to help prevent infection. Tough, Flexible Fabric Provides lasting, durable protection in colors to match your team or your attitude.

Standard Strip Bandages Fingertip & Knuckle Bandages Extra Long Bandages Knee/Elbow Bandages Extra Large Bandages Variety Pack Bandages Usage Standard strip size bandage for use on small wounds on body, fingers or toes Two different shapes for commonly injured areas: one for tips of fingers & toes, the other to cover the knuckle area Strip bandage with one extra long side to provide extra wraps around fingers or toes for even more staying power Large specially shaped bandage fits on knees & elbows for wide, fitted protection that lasts Extra large bandage for covering and protecting larger, wider wounds Sizes and shapes for all kinds of small to large wounds Size & Count 20 count (¾” x 3” strip) 20 count - 10 fingertip (1 ¾” x 2”), 10 knuckle (1 ½“ x 3”) 20 count (¾” x 4 ¾“extra long) 10 count (3” x 3” knee/elbow) 10 count (2” x 4” extra large) 50 count - 20 strip,10 fingertip,10 knuckle, 10 extra large

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun and functional
reviews.reviewText: Listen, as an adult, it's still fun to have brightly colored bandages. I actually wish the blue was even brighter, and would prefer fewer black bandages just to have more fun colors.The knuckle and fingertip shapes are really useful and the biggest reason I like these bandages. They adhere really well and I much prefer fabric over plastic. However, the adhesion is kind of a one-shot deal. If you don't get the alignment right and need to pull it off, the second "stick" will be far weaker and the bandage will peel off a lot faster. The fabric tends to unravel a bit at the edges throughout the day as well. But I haven't found any bandages that don't do that, so this is my go-to set of bandages at this time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I need a bandage that STICKS and these are the best I've found!!
reviews.reviewText: I long ago gave up on the plastic strip bandages and switched to fabric. Besides the fabric, I look for great adhesion, and a large pad. Well this brand and series is the closest I've come to perfect that you can still get, and get 2 1/2 of those three things right.These bandages STICK. There's not a whole lot else to say except they do the job very well in that department. The pad size is decent, not awesome, but since the fabric is so sturdy and the adhesive is so good, I can live with it. I have definitely found my go-to bandage and have ordered these a number of times now thanks to my house full of kids.Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best bandaids ever
reviews.reviewText: We own a construction company, the crew is always banged and scraped. These things stand the tests of chemicals, gloves, paint, handwashing and when you remove it the skin under is clean as a whistle. 10/10

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Look no further, these are hands down the best bandaids. I mean come on, I’m writing a review for bandaids right now… who does that?! They are that good!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Super strong, maybe too strong!
reviews.reviewText: These badges are very, very strong! Normally I like this, but I had a wound that needed cover for about a week. The bandage would have lasted that long, but I preferred to change it to clean the wound and then put a new bandage on. After the third bandage change, I realized that the bandage was peeling off the top layer of my skin and caused another bad wound!Any way, they are nice and strong bandages, but be careful of bandage changes!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome! Great quality & feel.
reviews.reviewText: Highly recommend these band aids. I like the fabric feel and they held up really well when I was working around the house. The shapes are really good too - I cut the end of my finger and it fit great. It also didn’t loosen up or fall off throughout the day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Don’t put on sensitive skin!
reviews.reviewText: These bandaids are no joke. Great for putting on fingers/hands where you need it to hold up with washing hands and moving. I don’t recommend putting on sensitive skin or trying to rip off before it’s ready. The adhesive is strong and I did tear some skin off on my thigh… then used a bigger bandage and left it alone to heal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Colorful complete coverage
reviews.reviewText: Was pleasantly surprised, or as surprised as one can be by a bandage. Had deep cut on back of hand and these offered total coverage that really stayed put. Especially useful for one whose hands are always in motion. The unusual colors were a nice change from typically drab flesh-toned ones. Box should last a long time but would purchase again.

reviews.reviewerName: David Morales Zamarripa David Morales Zamarripa
reviews.reviewText: Se recibió Abierto y sin la cantidad indicada de producto ... Robo
